" }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/Dictionary": { "caption": "Dictionary", "blurb": "A list of acronyms that I should remember", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "Dashboard", "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/Dictionary", "text": "\define thisListMacro() <$view field=title/> - {{$:/data/Dictionary##$(thisIndex)$}}
\end \define thisEditListMacro() <$view field=title/> - {{$:/data/Dictionary##$(thisIndex)$}} <$button> Remove <$action-deletefield $tiddler='$:/data/Dictionary' $field="""$(thisIndex)$""" $value='' />
\end \define thisRegEx() $(thisSearch)$(?i) \end \define thisSearchMacro()
    <$list filter="""[[$:/data/Dictionary]indexes[]regexp:title[(?i)$(thisSearch)$]]""" >
  • <> - <$transclude tiddler="$:/data/Dictionary" index=<>/>
\end \define thisEditMacro()
    <$list filter="""[[$:/data/Dictionary]indexes[]regexp:title[(?i)$(thisSearch)$]]""" > <$set name=thisItem value=<> >
  • <> <> - <$transclude tiddler="$:/data/Dictionary" index=<>/>
\end \define thisDeleteButton() <$button set="""$:/data/Dictionary##$(thisItem)$""" > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end Term: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/temp/dictionary' field='name' />
Meaning: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/temp/dictionary' field='meaning' />
<$button> Add Term <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/temp/dictionary!!name' text='' > <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/data/Dictionary' $index={{$:/temp/dictionary!!name}} $value={{$:/temp/dictionary!!meaning}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/dictionary' name='' meaning='' /> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > <$button set='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' setTo='edit' > Edit Dictionary <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > <$button set='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' setTo='noedit' > Done Editing Search: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/dictionary' field='search' />
<$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > Type in the search box to find specific items on the list <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > Click on the trashcan icon to remove an item <$set name='thisSearch' value={{$:/temp/dictionary!!search}} > <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > <> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/dictionary/editreveal' text='edit' > <> " }, "$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/readme", "text": "This is a simple searchable dictionary. To use it open the tiddler [[$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/Dictionary]], you add a term by entering the `Term` text field, and add the definition in the `Meaning` text field, then click the `Add Term` button. You can search the existing terms using the `Search` text box. Clicking on `Edit Dictionary` adds buttons thta will allow you to remove entries from the dictionary. You can put `{{$:/plugins/OokTech/SearchableDictionary/Dictionary}}` inside any tiddler to display the dictionary in that tiddler.
